data.name: Object Wars
data.detailed_description:
Wishlist now


About the Game

Object Wars is a third person shooter with several game modes like death match or battle royale.

In death match, two teams fight against each other to run the other out of lives. Cooperate with your teammates to turn your enemies back into inanimate object.

In battle royal, up to 32 players compete to be the ultimate survivor. Arm yourself with weapons placed all over the map and prove your worth in a thrilling cup-sized battle.




Jump with the firecracker and shotgun
Fly with the square
Grab with the grappling hook

data.short_description: The war is small, in Object Wars fights the other players with weapons like a toothpick launcher, the last one alive wins the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel core i3 / Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel core i5 / Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
